subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Justin Morneau hit a three-run homer and Chris Capuano pitched five strong innings in Tokyo as the Major League Baseball All-Stars beat Japan, 6-1, for the first win of their five-game postseason tour.
snippet: Justin Morneau hit a three-run homer and Chris Capuano pitched five strong innings in Tokyo as the Major League Baseball All-Stars beat Japan, 6-1, for the first win of their five-game postseason tour.
